action.msg: I have to agree. I wonder if they've been doing this for a while...
It makes me wonder who this kids parents are.
Poor thing must be all alone. Can I ask, where'd you get that balloon?
You really may just be his dad.
Hey! I remember a LOT of things! My head is not empty, it is full of a LOT of knowledge that most people would pay for!
What'd you have for breakfast yesterday?
Hey kid, let's go another round!
